title: TestSearchPerf no longer needs to duplicate SolrIndexSearcher.(NO_CHECK_QCACHE|NO_CHECK_FILTERCACHE)
description: TestSearchPerf.doListGen no longer needs to duplicate SolrIndexSearcher.(NO_CHECK_QCACHE|GET_DOCSET|NO_CHECK_FILTERCACHE|GET_SCORES) since they are now visible to it (at package or public level).
